card.description: Minimalist puzzle game about connecting stars

description.title: Constellations
description.description:
Constellations is a minimalist puzzle game about connecting stars.

This was a personal year-long project with my friend. I was responsible for all the code and tech art, as well as some level design for the game.

Constellations is released on Steam and itch.io and is coming to mobile devices soon.

card.title: Retro Rift
card.description: Fast-paced platformer with time travel mechanics

description.title: Retro Rift
description.description:
Retro rift is a fast-paced precision platformer with time travel mechanics.

This was a week-long project I made in collaboration with my friend. I was behind the game’s movement code and designed most of the levels.

The game has received the 9th place (out of nearly 1800 entires) at Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

description.title: Sneks
description.description:
Sneks is a cute puzzle inspired by the classic snake game.

Sneks was made over the month-long Godot Wild Jam #45. I was responsible for the game’s internal logic and smooth line rendering for snakes, as well as helped design some levels and mechanics.
